description: When I tried to launch the app it would bring up the terminal for a split second and then was gone and the app did nothing.

After installation, type the following command in the working terminal.

asciinema rec

It will give you a hint and start recording.
summary: Do not launch it directly; typing commands in the open terminal

description:
Have you ever been watching a cli tutorial on youtube and wished you could select and copy text? asciinema not only allows you to record and replay a terminal session, it also allows these recordings to be embedded in a web player which behaves like most web players, except that it is actually text based. go check out the official website https://asciinema.org/ for many examples.
This is a great way to record a terminal session for personal reference. It's also ideal for sharing a terminal session as you would for a tutorial. It can even record a terminal based app like htop. If it runs in your terminal, you can probably record it and play back a perfect copy.
summary: Best app I've seen in awhile
